DocAttribute.Name: Currency
DocAttribute.Documentation: Code or name of the currency. Permissible values are the three-letter alphabetic currency codes as per [ISO 4217](http://www.iso.org/iso/support/faqs/faqs_widely_used_standards/widely_used_standards_other/currency_codes/currency_codes_list-1.htm){ target="_top"}, for example CNY, EUR, GBP, JPY, USD.
